author: Rachel McRady
title: Brandi Glanville and New Boyfriend DJ Friese Pose Entirely Nude in Bed Together in NSFW Pic
text: Brandi Glanville and New Boyfriend DJ Friese Pose Entirely Nude in Bed Together in NSFW Pic by Rachel McRady 2:43 AM PST, February 21, 2017 Photo: Instagram Whoa there! Brandi Glanville and her new boyfriend, Donald “DJ” Friese left nothing to the imagination on Monday, posing nude in bed together on the businessman’s Instagram account. “Loving my V-Day Present #reflection #nofilter #bodyart,”Friese captioned the X-rated mirror selfie of Glanville lying naked on the bed as he caressed her butt. On Sunday, Glanville shared a “before" shot of the pair sitting on the bed together, fully clothed. Photo: Instagram “Missing my V date mr @djfriese,” she captioned the photo of herself rocking a hot pink mini dress with a plunging neckline. The pair stepped out on their first red carpet together after five months of dating earlier this month. “He's the girl in the relationship,” Glanville joked to ET at the time, admitting she doesn’t remember all the details of their romance. “He knows everything that I don't know.” A post shared by Brandi Glanville (@brandiglanville) on Feb 19, 2017 at 2:29pm PST The pair met on Tinder, and Friese marks Glanville’s first serious relationship since her messy 2010 split from ex-husband Eddie Cibrian. For more from the couple’s first joint interview, watch the clip below! RELATED SLIDESHOW
